Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui, TestView, View
public interface UserInterface
Defines a generic view to be implemented by each view type (e.g. CLI, GUI in JavaFX, ...).

    • showNicknameResult

      void showNicknameResult(boolean nicknameAccepted, boolean playerReconnected)
      Shows to the user if the Login succeeded.
      Parameters:
      nicknameAccepted - indicates if the chosen nickname has been accepted.
      playerReconnected - indicates if the nickname chosen was that of a player previously disconnected

    • askGameSettings
